Das schwarze Schaf   is a 1944 German/Czechoslovak film, directed by Miroslav Cikán. It stars  Victor Janson, Albert Johannes, and Lotte Koch.
Cast
* Victor Janson
* Albert Johannes
* Lotte Koch
* Wilhelm König
* Ernst Legal
